issue.title: Moving the sun doesn't change shadows.

content.raw:
Changing the position of a directional light doesn't affect the shadows; it's only the orientation that matters. Try using the rotate tool instead of the move tool, [as shown in this example video](https://vimeo.com/55116250).

I'll follow up with this on the answers website.

Is there a way we can explain this functionality better to the users?
